content: pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only - not a finished product - no returns on digital products all sales are final decorate your home with bulky & quick nesting baskets they make the perfect gift basket or decorative storage basket for your home this quick and easy pattern is worked in simple stitches and includes a video tutorial on youtube three sizes are included in the pattern difficulty easy written in standard american terms yarn mary maxim home bulky weight #5 68% cotton 32% polyamide 108yds/150g shown in a grey b taupe and c sand small 94 yds - 54yds a 40yds b medium 148 yds - 83yds a 65yds c large 198 yds - 116yds b 82yds c for the set purchase 2 balls of each colour scraps can make another medium basket hook us k/10 5 6 5mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge materials bulky yarn needle scissors measuring tape garment tags leather rivets gauge 6 sts and 4 row equal to 2 in half_double_crochet 5 sts and 5 5 row equal to 2 in single_crochet blo/flo video link https //youtu be/tgdh8ivfi78 you are welcome to sell finished products from this design please reference mj s off the hook as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
